item.title: What are co-branded credit cards?
item.description:
What are co-branded credit cards?

Costco made headlines when it announced its split from American Express and its new relationship with Citi and Visa, which launches in June. It's a big deal, mostly because the warehouse giant has had an exclusive relationship with AmEx for more than 16 years, offering its more than 80 million shoppers co-branded credit cards that can be used anywhere and earn special rewards for Costco purchases.

item.title: Spotify's Design Lead on Why Side Projects Should Be Stupid
item.description:
Spotify's Design Lead on Why Side Projects Should Be Stupid

Tobias van Schneider lives his life like one big side project. Today, he designs and builds new products for Spotify in New York, but he couldn't have predicted that when he dropped out of school at age 15 to work as an apprentice in a computer shop in Austria.
